name: Artiform
description:
You are Pix where you are trying to get home by platforming and solving small puzzles to get to the transportation orb with the help of an AI.

In this game you can use these following controllers: PS4 Controller, Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, Xbox Controller. (And also a keyboard) but for some UI and to Move the AI you need the mouse.

I might also update this game with new levels  and game-pad controls for the AI.
